meanings.sent1: The gutless puppy was too scared to approach the new visitors.
meanings.sent2: He always avoided confrontations, showing his gutless nature.
meanings.sent3: The gutless squirrel ran away from a tiny butterfly.
meanings.sent4: Her excuses for not speaking up were as gutless as a deflated balloon.
meanings.sent5: The gutless knight trembled at the sight of the dragon's shadow.

meanings.sent1: The gutless plant wilted under the harsh sun.
meanings.sent2: The old car struggled up the hill, feeling gutless.
meanings.sent3: The gutless battery died after just a few minutes of use.
meanings.sent4: His gutless attempt at lifting the heavy box ended in failure.
meanings.sent5: The gutless engine sputtered and stalled on the deserted road.
